communicate_checks.justification:
Information '22.55' communicated in the message:
 'Great choice! To confirm, you'd like to exchange the **Cycling Helmet (Red, Size S, Low Ventilation)** for the **Cycling Helmet (Blue, Size M, High Ventilation)**. 

The price difference is **$22.55**, which will be charged to your Visa card ending in **7312**. 

Once you confirm, I'll process the exchange. You'll receive an email with instructions on how to return the original helmet. Please note that this is the only time an exchange or modification can be made for this order.

Shall I go ahead and process this for you?'
